Neighborhood¶

The neighborhood property holds all the neighbors for each point in the point cloud. Each neighborhood is defined by a PointNeighborhood.PointNeighborhood.

Point Neighborhood¶

class PointNeighborhood.PointNeighborhood(points_subset, distances=None)[source]¶

Attributes

Methods

computeDistances() Compute the distances between each point and the center point
neighbors_vectors() Find the direction of each point to the center point
center_point_coords¶

The point to which the neighbors relate

Returns: coordinates of the center point
Return type: np.ndarray
center_point_idx¶

The index of the point to which the neighbors relate

Returns: index of the center point
Return type: int
computeDistances()[source]¶

Compute the distances between each point and the center point

Returns: array of distances
Return type: np.array
distances¶

Array of the distances between each point and the center point

Returns: array of distances
Return type: np.array
neighborhoodIndices¶
neighbors¶

Return a point set of the neighborhood

Returns: points that compose the neighborhood (including the point itself at index 0)
Return type: PointSubSet
neighbors_vectors()[source]¶

Find the direction of each point to the center point

Returns: array of directions
Return type: np.array nx3
numberOfNeighbors¶

The number of points within the neighborhood (including the point itself)

Returns: the number of points within the neighborhood
Return type: int
radius¶

Mean radius of the neighbors

Returns: mean radius
Return type: float

Neighbors Factory¶

class NeighborsFactory.NeighborsFactory[source]¶

Find neighbors of a given points using different methods. Use this factory to create either PointNeighbors or NeighborProperty for a whole point cloud.

Methods

CalculateAllPointsNeighbors(pointset[, …]) Compute all points neighbors within search radius with maximal number of neighbors.
GetNeighborsIn3dRange(points, x, y, z, radius) Find all tokens (points) in radius range
GetNeighborsIn3dRange_KDtree(ind, pntSet, radius) Find neighbors of a point using KDtree
GetNeighborsIn3dRange_SphericCoord(pnt, …) Find points in defined window - neighbors of a point
GetPointNeighborsByCoordinates(…[, …]) Define a point’s neighborhood according to its coordinates
GetPointNeighborsByID(pointset3d, idx, …) Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.
_NeighborsFactory__PrintOverrideNeighborhoodCalculations(…)
param neighborProperty:
  an existing NeighborsProperty which will be override :param exampleIndex: :param newRadius: :param newMaxNN:

balltreePointSet_rnn(pointset_bt, search_radius) Create NeighborsProperty of BallTreePointSet (whole cloud) based on search radius (RNN)

static CalculateAllPointsNeighbors(pointset, search_radius=0.05, maxNN=20, maxProcesses=8)[source]¶

Compute all points neighbors within search radius with maximal number of neighbors.

Parameters:
  • pointset (np.array, PointSet.PointSet, PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – a point cloud
  • search_radius (float) – the radius in which the neighbors are collected. Default: 0.05m
  • maxNN (int) – maximum points per neighborhood. Default: 20
  • maxProcesses (int) – ** for later use **
Returns:

neighbors property where each point has a PointNeighborhood defined.
Return type:

NeighborsProperty

Warning

Currently, the number of processes does not work

    • PointSet
  • y z (x) – search point coordinates
  • radius – Radius of ball field
Returns:

points in ranges
Return type:

static GetNeighborsIn3dRange_KDtree(ind, pntSet, radius, tree=None, num_neighbor=None)[source]¶

Find neighbors of a point using KDtree

Parameters:
  • ind (int) – search point coordinates
  • pntSet (PointSet.PointSet) – the points in which the neighbors are required - in cartesian coordinates
  • radius – search radius
  • tree (cKDTree) – KD tree
  • num_neighbor (int) – number of nearest neighbors if num_neighbor!=None the result will be the exact number of neighbors and not neighbors in radius
Returns:

subset of neighbors from original pointset
Return type:

PointSubSet

static GetPointNeighborsByID(pointset3d, idx, searchRadius, maxNN, returnValues=True, neighborsProperty=None, override=False, useOriginal=False, rotate=False)[source]¶

Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.

Parameters:
  • pointset3d (PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – the cloud in which the point is searched for
  • idx (int or np.ndarray) – point index
  • searchRadius (float) – the search radius for neighbors
  • maxNN (int) – maximum number of neighbors
  • returnValues (bool) – default: True
  • neighborsProperty (NeighborsProperty) – Existing neighborhood property which should be override
  • override (bool) – default: False
  • rotate (bool) – flag whether to rotate the neighborhood or not. Default: False
  • useOriginal (bool) – default: False
Returns:

the point neighborhood
Return type:

PointNeighborhood

A generic method to build NeighborsProperty based on k-nearest-neighbors (KNN)

  • pointset (PointSet.PointSet, BallTreePointSet.BallTreePointSet, PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – the cloud to which the NeighborhoodProperty should be computed
  • k_nearest_neighbors (int) – the number of neighbors
  • method (ufunc) – the method that should be used for computation
Returns:

Neighbors Property for the whole cloud
Return type:

NeighborsProperty

Usage Example

 7
 8
 9

12
13
14
 
        from PointSetOpen3D import PointSetOpen3D
        pr = cProfile.Profile()
        pr.enable()
        colors = []
        pts = []

        # for neighbors and normal computations
        folderPath = '../../test_data/'
        dataName = 'test_pts'

        knn = 50
        pcl = IOFactory.ReadPts(folderPath + dataName + '.pts', pts, colors, merge=False)
        pcd = PointSetOpen3D(pcl[0])
        neighbors = NeighborsFactory.buildNeighbors_knn(pcl[0], knn, method=NeighborsFactory.pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree)

1

4
 
        neighbors = NeighborsFactory.buildNeighbors_rnn(pcl[0], search_radius,
                                                        method=NeighborsFactory.pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree)

        print('hello')
static point3d_neighbors_kdtree(pt, pointset3d, radius=None, knn=None)[source]¶

Find neighbors to a single point based kd-tree.

This method can be used either for RNN, KNN or RKNN, depends on the parameters sent. Used only with PointSetOpen3D

Parameters:
  • pt (np.array, int) – the point to look for (index or 3x1)
  • pointset3d (PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – the point cloud in which the neighbors are serached in
  • radius (float) – maximal radius for neighbors
  • knn (int) – number of neighbors to look for

Note

If both radius and knn are sent, then the RNN is used, which means: it returns at most k nearest neighbors that have distances to the anchor point less than a given radius

Returns: point neighborhood
Return type: PointNeighborhood

See also

FLANN, pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree(), pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree(), pointSetOpen3D_rknn_kdTree()

static pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree(pointset3d, k_nearest_neighbors)[source]¶

Create NeighborsProperty of PointSetOpen3D (whole cloud) based on k-nearest neighbors (KNN)

Parameters:
  • pointset3d (PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – the cloud to which the NeighborProperty should be computed
  • k_nearest_neighbors (int) – number of neighbors to search
Returns:

a property consisting of the PointNeighborhood for each point in the cloud
Return type:

NeighborsProperty

See also

FLANN, pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree(), point3d_neighbors_kdtree(), pointSetOpen3D_rknn_kdTree()

static pointSetOpen3D_rknn_kdTree(pointset3d, k_nearest_neighbors, max_radius)[source]¶

Create NeighborsProperty of PointSetOpen3D (whole cloud) using KRNN.

Return a neighborhood with at most k nearest neighbors that have distances to the anchor point less than a given radius.

Parameters:
  • pointset3d (PointSetOpen3D.PointSetOpen3D) – the cloud to which the NeighborProperty should be computed
  • k_nearest_neighbors (int) – number of neighbors to search
  • max_radius (float) – maximal radius of neighbors
Returns:

a property consisting of the PointNeighborhood for each point in the cloud
Return type:

NeighborsProperty

See also

FLANN, pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree(), pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree(), point3d_neighbors_kdtree()

static pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree(pointset3d, search_radius, verbose=False)[source]¶

Create NeighborsProperty of PointSetOpen3D (whole cloud) based on search radius (RNN)

Parameters:
  • pointset3d – the cloud to which the NeighborProperty should be computed
  • search_radius – the neighborhood radius

Optionals

Parameters: verbose (bool) – print inter-running
Returns: a property consisting of the PointNeighborhood for each point in the cloud
Return type: NeighborsProperty

See also

FLANN , pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree(), point3d_neighbors_kdtree(), pointSetOpen3D_rknn_kdTree()

Note

The three methods: NeighborsFactory.NeighborsFactory.pointSetOpen3D_rnn_kdTree(), NeighborsFactory.NeighborsFactory.pointSetOpen3D_knn_kdTree() and NeighborsFactory.NeighborsFactory.pointSetOpen3D_krnn_kdTree() can be rewritten, without repetition. Only I couldn’t be bothered… (RA)
